desc: Wombat Ware developed the Cooling Case that will keep your iPad cool. The powerful & quiet blower fans prevents the iPad from overheating and shutting down when you need to use it in warmer conditions. Our cases are also thin and lightweight enough to fit your everyday usage so you can leave it on all the time.

layout.text: Using Your iPad As An Electronic Flight Bag?
We prevent thermal shutdowns and made it work with different mountings
